* All package actions in WCM start from the {{delivery}} folder, so you should go to this folder first.
{code}
	$ cd ecms/delivery
{code}

h1. Package WCM standalone version - Tomcat bundle {anchor:id=CONTref.Preface.Package.WCMStandaloneVersion.TomcatBundle}
{code}
$ cd wcm/assembly
$ mvn clean install
{code}


h1. Package WCM with workflow enabled - Tomcat bundle {anchor:id=CONTref.Preface.Package.WCMWorkflowEnabled.TomcatBundle}
{code}
$ cd wkf-wcm/assembly
$ mvn clean install
{code}

h1. Make WCM EAR packages to run with jBoss {anchor:id=CONTref.Preface.Package.WCMEARRunWithJBoss}

* Make WCM extension EAR
{code}
$ cd packaging/wcm/ear
$ mvn clean install
{code}

* Make WCM demo sites EAR
{code}
$ cd packaging/ecmdemo/ear
$ mvn clean install
{code}

* Make workflow EAR
{code}
$ cd packaging/workflow/ear
$ mvn clean install
{code}
